item.title: Dec 20, Christ's Light Radio Episode 5: Christ's Light on Speaking with Your Angels
item.description: Are you feeling unfulfilled in your spiritual journey? Does your faith seem dead or on the brink of dying? In this fourth episode of Christ's Light Radio, Christine will discuss how to enliven your Christian walk and be inspired by the Holy Spirit to carry out God's purpose for you in the world.

item.title: Dec 9, Christ's Light Radio Episode 3: Christ's Light on the Nature of Enlightenment
item.description: In this episode of Christ's Light Radio, Brandon and Christine discuss the nature of enlightenment. What is it? What does it mean for your life? How can you reach it? Listen in and discover the key to infinite joy. The phone lines will be open, so call in and we'll discuss your spiritual path and how to become awakened.

item.title: Dec 7, Christ's Light Radio Episode 2: Christ's Light on the End of All Suffering
item.description: Are you tired of the seemingly endless cycle of suffering? Return for this second episode of Christ's Light Radio as Brandon and Christine discuss how you can break the hold of suffering over you starting today. The phonelines will be open, so call in and we'll help you see how to dissolve suffering in your own life and replace it with joy.

item.title: Dec 5, Christ's Light Radio Episode 1: Christ's Light on the Spiritual Journey
item.description: In this first show on Christ's Light Radio, Brandon and Christine will discuss the importance of the spiritual journey in our lives. Regardless of the religious or spiritual path you may follow, this show will help you to accelerate your spiritual growth and bring greater peace and happiness into your life.

item.title: Oct 26, Featured Product: Open Ended Ceremonial Horn
item.description:
Open Ended Ceremonial Horn
Price: $14.95

Add to Cart

Whether in gleeful celebration or in solemn ceremony, this horn adds an old-world feel to your ritual that can't be passed up. Coming 6" in length or longer, it is the intact horn of a water buffalo, providing you with a wonderful ornament for your altar, drinking horn, or, when paired with another, a wonderful addition to a representation of the horned God, whether you are fixing it to a costume or creating an image for your altar. When used as part of your ritual magic it can also add to your magick, adding to its energies the strength and stamina of the beast from which it came.
